menuModel

Class CumulativeScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • menuModel.CumulativeScore

  • public class CumulativeScore
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class calculates and stores the total cumulative points a player has achieved as well as total number of games played
    Author:
    Eric Liou
